about_the_game:
You have been abducted by aliens, and now you find yourself on their spaceship. To survive, you must solve challenging puzzles and complete tasks assigned by your alien captors. Your goal is to figure out how the mysterious control panels work, where each button and lever requires careful attention.

Press buttons, flip switches, activate levers, and observe the consequences. The interface seems familiar, but you never know what will happen until you try. Are you ready to find out what each button does?

On some levels, you’ll need to think carefully to unravel the logic of the mechanisms, but sometimes, simply pressing everything might be the solution. And in arcade-style levels, get ready for active control: pilot combat ships, collect resources, play breakout-style games, and explore the vastness of space. Don’t forget about challenges where you need to change planetary gravity, manage landings, set up portals, or find a path using sonar.

Key Features:

  • A unique indie project — a game crafted with love and attention to detail.

  • 45 unique puzzles — each challenge brings a different approach and difficulty.

  • Atmospheric pixel art graphics — a visual style that evokes a sense of retro nostalgia.

  • Varied gameplay — a blend of well-thought-out puzzles and dynamic arcade challenges.

  • Mysterious interfaces — feel like an explorer uncovering the secrets of alien technology.
detailed_description:
You have been abducted by aliens, and now you find yourself on their spaceship. To survive, you must solve challenging puzzles and complete tasks assigned by your alien captors. Your goal is to figure out how the mysterious control panels work, where each button and lever requires careful attention.

Press buttons, flip switches, activate levers, and observe the consequences. The interface seems familiar, but you never know what will happen until you try. Are you ready to find out what each button does?

On some levels, you’ll need to think carefully to unravel the logic of the mechanisms, but sometimes, simply pressing everything might be the solution. And in arcade-style levels, get ready for active control: pilot combat ships, collect resources, play breakout-style games, and explore the vastness of space. Don’t forget about challenges where you need to change planetary gravity, manage landings, set up portals, or find a path using sonar.

Key Features:

  • A unique indie project — a game crafted with love and attention to detail.

  • 45 unique puzzles — each challenge brings a different approach and difficulty.

  • Atmospheric pixel art graphics — a visual style that evokes a sense of retro nostalgia.

  • Varied gameplay — a blend of well-thought-out puzzles and dynamic arcade challenges.

  • Mysterious interfaces — feel like an explorer uncovering the secrets of alien technology.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04+ / SteamOS
  • Processor: Intel Pentium 4 or equivalent AMD (with SSE2 support)
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics supporting OpenGL 2.1
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any ALSA compatible sound card
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04+ / SteamOS
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or equivalent AMD
  • Memory: 4096 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics supporting OpenGL 3.3
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any ALSA compatible sound card

name: Alien Ship Console

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 / 8 / 10 / 11 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Pentium 4 or AMD Athlon 64 (with SSE2 support)
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with 512 MB VRAM and WebGL support
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any DirectX compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 / 11 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or equivalent AMD
  • Memory: 4096 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with 1024 MB VRAM and WebGL support
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any DirectX compatible sound card

short_description: Alien Ship Console is an atmospheric puzzle game with arcade elements, where you must figure out the mysterious interfaces on an alien spaceship. Explore buttons and levers, solve unique challenges for an unknown alien civilization.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Bulgarian, Portuguese - Brazil, Hungarian, Vietnamese, Greek, Danish, Indonesian, Spanish - Latin America, Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Dutch, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Romanian, Russian, Thai, Turkish, Ukrainian, Finnish, Czech, Swedish, Japanese, Azerbaijani, Albanian, Amharic, Armenian, Assamese, Afrikaans, Basque, Belarusian, Bangla, Bosnian, Valencian, Welsh, Wolof, Galician, Georgian, Gujarati, Dari, Zulu, Hebrew, Igbo, Irish, Icelandic, Yoruba, Kazakh, Kannada, Catalan, Quechua, Kinyarwanda, K'iche', Konkani, Xhosa, Khmer, Kyrgyz, Latvian, Lithuanian, Luxembourgish, Macedonian, Malay, Malayalam, Maltese, Maori, Marathi, Mongolian, Nepali, Odia, Punjabi (Gurmukhi), Punjabi (Shahmukhi), Persian, Serbian, Sotho, Sinhala, Sindhi, Slovak, Slovenian, Sorani, Swahili, Tajik, Tamil, Tatar, Telugu, Tigrinya, Tswana, Turkmen, Uzbek, Uyghur, Urdu, Filipino, Hausa, Hindi, Croatian, Cherokee, Scots, Estonian
